Title: Two Much
Writer: Donald E. Westlake (novel), Fernando Trueba (screenplay), David Trueba (screenplay)
Actors: Antonio Banderas, Melanie Griffith, Daryl Hannah, Danny Aiello
Plot: A young gallerist is in love with two sisters at the same time. In order to solve the problem he decides to invent his own twin-brother.
Production: PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, Lolafilms S.A., Interscope Communications, Touchstone Pictures
